name: Ana Medina
bio: Ana is currently working as a Chaos Engineer at Gremlin, helping companies avoid outages by running proactive chaos engineering experiments. She last worked at Uber where she was an engineer on the SRE and Infrastructure teams specifically focusing on chaos engineering and cloud computing. Catch her tweeting at @Ana_M_Medina mostly about traveling, diversity in tech, and mental health.

talks.title: Navigating Mental Health as a Human
talks.desc: Itâ€™s 2019 and many of us are talking about mental health in public platforms but at the same time we are unsure how to tackle this topic all while helping others as well as ourselves. Ana will reflect on her own experiences and share about her journey from the ER to dealing with Medical Leave as well as providing tips on how to address this topic without the social stigma. Join us and pick up tips on being able to identify initial signs of burnout, making yourself a priority, self care, and the resources that are available to us.
